english.segment1: our souls are free. but i now can see. that my soul oh LORD. united souls shall be. so free through you but. rip my soul erased in wickedness. hear my cry cease my pain. there you lay
english.segment2: galatians 6:17. from here hence forth let no man trouble me. for i bear in my body the marks of the LORD JESUS
